All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Address
The Address class represents a physical address with fields for zip code, street, number, city, and state, and includes methods for checking equality and generating hash codes based on the id field.
AddressController
The AddressController class is a Java REST controller that handles POST requests to create a new address using an AddressDTO object.
AddressDTO
This is a Java record class named AddressDTO that represents a data transfer object for an address.
AddressMapper
The AddressMapper class provides a static method to convert an AddressDTO object to an Address object in Java.
AddressRelation
The AddressRelation class in Java defines methods for checking equality and generating hash codes based on its embedded ID field.
AddressRelationPK
The AddressRelationPK class is a Java implementation of a composite primary key for a database table, with a custom equals() and hashCode() method.
AddressRelationRepository
This code is defining an interface called AddressRelationRepository that extends the JpaRepository interface.
AddressRepository
This code is defining an interface called AddressRepository that extends the JpaRepository interface.
AddressService
The AddressService class creates and saves a new address to the database, along with its relation to a parent user, and returns a response with the new address's ID and a success message.
Appliance
The Appliance class defines attributes and methods for an appliance object, including an ID, name, brand, model, and power.
ApplianceController
The ApplianceController class is a Java REST controller that handles requests related to creating new appliances.
ApplianceDTO
This is a Java record class named ApplianceDTO that represents a data transfer object for an appliance.
ApplianceMapper
The ApplianceMapper class converts an ApplianceDTO object to an Appliance object by setting the corresponding attributes.
ApplianceRelation
This is a Java class representing a relation between appliances, with methods for checking equality and generating hash codes.
ApplianceRelationPK
This is a Java class representing a composite primary key for a many-to-one relationship between an Address and an Appliance entity.
ApplianceRelationRepository
This code is defining an interface called ApplianceRelationRepository that extends the JpaRepository interface.
ApplianceRepository
This code is defining an interface called ApplianceRepository that extends the JpaRepository interface.
ApplianceService
This is a Java class that creates an appliance and saves it to a repository, along with its relation to an address.
CorsConfiguration
The CorsConfiguration class is a Java configuration class that allows cross-origin resource sharing (CORS) for all origins and only allows GET and POST HTTP methods.
HandleErrors
This class contains exception handlers for various types of exceptions and returns a map of error details for each exception.
KirghEnergyApplication
This is the main class for running KIRGH Energy REST application in Java.
Power
This is an enum class that represents the power voltages from general appliances in Brazil.
State
This is an enum class that represents the states of Brazil.
User
The User class represents a user with attributes such as name, email, birth date, gender, and CPF, and overrides the equals and hashCode methods to compare and hash based on the CPF attribute.
UserController
The UserController class defines a REST API endpoint for creating a new user by taking in a validated userDTO object and returning a ResponseEntity.
UserDTO
This is a Java record class called UserDTO that represents a data transfer object for a user.
UserGender
This is an enum class that represents the biological human genders.
UserMapper
The UserMapper class provides a static method to convert a UserDTO object to a User object in Java.
UserRelation
This is a Java class representing a user relation entity with a primary key and methods for checking equality and generating hash codes.
UserRelationDTO
This is a Java record class named UserRelationDTO that represents a data transfer object for a user relation.
UserRelationPK
The UserRelationPK class in Java defines a primary key for a user relation and overrides the equals and hashCode methods to compare objects based on their owner and child attributes.
UserRelationRepository
This code is defining a Spring Data JPA repository interface for the UserRelation entity.
UserRepository
This line of code is defining an interface called UserRepository that extends the JpaRepository interface.
UserService
The UserService class creates a new user and saves it to the database, along with a user relation if specified, and returns a success message.
